typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		batters as (batter as (id as short, type as string)[]),
		id as short,
		name as string,
		ppu as double,
		topping as (id as short, type as string)[],
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['Influenza hospitalizations per 100K.csv']) ~> srcdatafile
srcdatafile foldDown(unroll(topping, topping),
	mapColumn(
		batters,
		id,
		name,
		ppu,
		topping,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 foldDown(unroll(batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		batters,
		id,
		name,
		ppu,
		topping,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
